When their jeep breaks down near a small plantation in the jungle outside Rio, the site of a former slave rebellion 150 years ago, Dick uses his powers to raise the dead of six executed Negro slaves whom target the college kids and the residents of the plantation to seek revenge for their deaths","poster_path":"/6H7VlWQHGRwAoT3o7RpRlDZYLeC.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[27],"popularity":7.291,"release_date":"1991-01-05","video":false,"vote_average":4.2,"vote_count":30},{"backdrop_path":"/cTtaRt8bFql0fKFwXm2GujQro89.jpg","id":210349,"title":"Hu-Du-Men","original_title":"虎度門","overview":"The \"Hu-Du-Men\" (loosely translated as \"stage door\") is an imaginary line separating the stage from reality, and a line that must be crossed each and every night by Sum (Josephine Siao), the aging star of a Cantonese Opera troupe. Nearing the twilight of a storied career, Sum must face a variety of challenging new obstacles, including the possible emigration of her family come 1997, the appearance of a promising young actress (Anita Yuen), the hiring of a Western-schooled stage director (David Wu), the surprising revelation of her daughter's sexuality, and finally the reappearance of a shocking secret from her past. Through it all, Sum must retain her professionalism and dignity, as the \"Hu-Du-Men\" between the stage and her life begins to blur. Emotional, intimate direction and Raymond To's intelligent, relevant screenplay make Hu-Du-Men worthwhile cinema, but it's Josephine Siao's brilliant, emotionally dynamic performance that sets this film above the rest.","poster_path":"/h2U64sTNSWuMz8Ck2hBgfHF0HB9.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"cn","genre_ids":[18,35],"popularity":5.993,"release_date":"1996-04-03","video":false,"vote_average":4.6,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":"/7q1DrXVUVCHTm6rMGtRcLSqDO3D.jpg","id":411268,"title":"Line Walker","original_title":"使徒行者","overview":"The details of undercover police officers are deleted from a police database and a senior officer is left struggling to know who are the undercover officers and who are the criminals.","poster_path":"/ePNjPe80sb1NitOLHTGh1DxDkWO.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"cn","genre_ids":[28,80,18],"popularity":16.901,"release_date":"2016-08-11","video":false,"vote_average":6.441,"vote_count":59},{"backdrop_path":"/txY4kzq8o97pm8sb4I0EtmPVXmf.jpg","id":171846,"title":"Killers","original_title":"キラーズ","overview":"A psychotic executive triggers a journalist's dark side, and they begin to form a strange bond through the internet.","poster_path":"/vkTi1Y5js8exwZ8V6mbXNEQy2Om.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[80,53,28],"popularity":12.556,"release_date":"2014-02-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":108},{"backdrop_path":"/kLNS5oNxWE2vpZNbr0wQ8M2RifQ.jpg","id":305143,"title":"Crayon Shin-chan: Intense Battle!
